text: You’d like to think that the American ambassador, as a representative of his country, disregarded the president’s improper request for a personal favor. https://t.co/m5JqpK3D27

text: Virginia Heffernan talks to Mary L. Trump, niece of the president, about the family relationship with glamor and dreariness, Trump’s golf game, and the symbolism of the family’s signature dish. https://t.co/aEu0oBAAy9
